markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Master Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3366) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 121</row>

**Archetype** [Captivator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=125)

**Prerequisites**
[Expert Captivator Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3363)

</column>

---

You master the most powerful spells that enchant and deceive. You learn a 7th-level occult spell. At 18th level, you learn an 8th-level spell, and at 20th level, you learn a 9th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) or [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92) school. You cast these spells as occult innate spells. You become a master with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.
name: Master Captivator Spellcasting
